original: @sa @#/_/'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa smon
analyzed: @sa @#/_/'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa smon
translated: Praise of Noble Tara with Aspirations🔽

original: lam grub pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: lam grub pa zhes bya ba/
translated: The Praise of Noble Tārā Called “Fulfilling Wishes”🔽In Sanskrit: Ārya-tārā-stotra-praṇidhāna-nāma

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya ta ra stod tra pra ni d+ha na na ma/_bod🔽skad du/_'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa smon lam grub pa zhes bya ba/_rje
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya ta ra stod tra pra ni d+ha na na ma/_bod skad du/_'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa smon lam grub pa zhes bya ba/_rje

original: btshun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/yi ge ljang ku ud pal las
analyzed: btshun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/yi ge ljang ku ud pal las
translated: From the green syllable tāṃ,🔽arose the green-colored one, with one face and two arms,

original: byung ba'i/_/sku mdog ljang ku zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/phyag gnyis sku la
analyzed: byung ba'i/_/sku mdog ljang ku zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/phyag gnyis sku la
translated: her two hands and body🔽adorned with many jewels.

original: rin chen du mas spras/_/yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/don
analyzed: rin chen du mas spras/_/yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/don
translated: I pay homage and praise you, Tārā, the meditation deity!🔽Her head is adorned with the five families, such as Amoghasiddhi,

original: grub la sogs rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing /_/bcu drug na tshhod 'dzum pa'i
analyzed: grub la sogs rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing /_/bcu drug na tshhod 'dzum pa'i
translated: and her face has the smile of a sixteen-year-old.

original: bzhin dang ldan/_/gzi brjid bzod dka' dgra tshhogs rtag par 'dul/_/
analyzed: bzhin dang ldan/_/gzi brjid bzod dka' dgra tshhogs rtag par 'dul/_/
translated: Her brilliance is hard to bear, and she always tames the hordes of enemies.🔽I pay homage and praise you, Tārā, the meditation deity!

original: yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/phyag g.yas mchod sbyin phyag g.yon
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/phyag g.yas mchod sbyin phyag g.yon
translated: Her right hand is in the mudrā of generosity, and her left

original: ud pal 'dzin/_/sna tshhogs pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/_/g.yas brkyang
analyzed: ud pal 'dzin/_/sna tshhogs pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/_/g.yas brkyang
translated: You stand with your right leg straight and your left leg bent,🔽your right hand in the boon-granting gesture and your left hand holding a blue lotus on a sun disc at your heart.

original: g.yon bskum tshhul gyis rab tu bzhugs/_/thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la rtag tu
analyzed: g.yon bskum tshhul gyis rab tu bzhugs/_/thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la rtag tu
translated: You always look upon beings with eyes of compassion,

original: gzigs/_/sku la 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sgrol ma 'phro/_/'khor ba'i sdug
analyzed: gzigs/_/sku la 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sgrol ma 'phro/_/'khor ba'i sdug
translated: and from your body emanate the eight Taras who protect from fear.🔽I pay homage and offer praise to you, the meditation deity Tara,

original: bsngal kun nas sgrol mdzad pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/🔽zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dang /_/sna tshhogs las rnams myur du sgrub
analyzed: bsngal kun nas sgrol mdzad pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/ zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dang /_/sna tshhogs las rnams myur du sgrub
translated: who completely liberates from all the sufferings of samsara.🔽You quickly accomplish the various activities of pacifying, increasing, controlling, and wrathful activity,

original: mdzad cing /_/phrin las rgya mtshho myur du bsgrub mdzad pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma
analyzed: mdzad cing /_/phrin las rgya mtshho myur du bsgrub mdzad pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma
translated: and you quickly accomplish an ocean of activity.🔽I pay homage and offer praise to you, the meditation deity Tara.🔽You completely liberate from the eight fears of lions, elephants, fire, snakes,

original: khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom rkun dang /_/ lcags sgrog rgya mtshho sha za'i 'jigs pa brgyad/_/de dag kun las yongs su sgrol
analyzed: khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom rkun dang /_/ lcags sgrog rgya mtshho sha za'i 'jigs pa brgyad/_/de dag kun las yongs su sgrol
translated: thieves, fetters, the ocean, and rakshasas.

original: mdzad pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/skye ba sngon bsags🔽las dang nyon mongs dang /_/'tshhams med lnga dang mi dge bcu la sogs/_/
analyzed: mdzad pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/skye ba sngon bsags las dang nyon mongs dang /_/'tshhams med lnga dang mi dge bcu la sogs/_/
translated: I praise and offer homage to you, my meditation deity, Tara.🔽Whatever terrible negative actions I have done in the past,🔽such as the five boundless ones, the ten nonvirtues, and so on,

original: mi bzad sdig pa'i las rnams ci bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad ma lus byang🔽bar shog_/bdag la de lta'i skye ba 'di las kyang /_/rmi ngan ltas ngan dus
analyzed: mi bzad sdig pa'i las rnams ci bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad ma lus byang bar shog_/bdag la de lta'i skye ba 'di las kyang /_/rmi ngan ltas ngan dus
translated: may all of them be completely purified.🔽May all bad dreams, bad omens, untimely death, and enemies,🔽all inauspiciousness, be purified for me in this very life,🔽and may my life span, merit, and enjoyments increase.

original: min 'chi dang dgra/_/bkra mi shis pa thams cad byang gyur cig_/tshhe dang bsod nams longs spyod rgyas par shog_/bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du//
analyzed: min 'chi dang dgra/_/bkra mi shis pa thams cad byang gyur cig_/tshhe dang bsod nams longs spyod rgyas par shog_/bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du//
translated: In all my future lives,🔽may I remember my meditation deity, Tara,

original: yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thams
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thams
translated: and may I attain all the common and supreme siddhis

original: cad dang /_/bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub 'gyur cing /_/phrin las ma
analyzed: cad dang /_/bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub 'gyur cing /_/phrin las ma
translated: and may all my wishes be fulfilled, and may I gain mastery over all activities.🔽To the compassionate meditation deity, Tara,

original: lus kun la dbang bsgyur shog_/yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje ldan pa la/_/bdag ni
analyzed: lus kun la dbang bsgyur shog_/yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje ldan pa la/_/bdag ni
translated: I offer my body, my possessions, and all my roots of virtue.

original: rab tu brtshon pa'i gdung sems kyis/_/bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang
analyzed: rab tu brtshon pa'i gdung sems kyis/_/bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang
translated: By the merit of this praise,

original: bsags des/_/rje btshun sgrol ma khyed dang mi 'bral shog_/rje btshun ma sgrol
analyzed: bsags des/_/rje btshun sgrol ma khyed dang mi 'bral shog_/rje btshun ma sgrol
translated: may I never be separated from you, noble Tārā.

original: ma la bstod pa smon lam thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen
analyzed: ma la bstod pa smon lam thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen
translated: The Praise of Noble Tārā Called “The Fulfillment of All Wishes”

analyzed: po tshan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'o//_//
translated: was composed by the great master Candragomin.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma la ba_ pa smon lam grub pa zhes bya ba/
